page.title: 11DANCES IN BIRSTALL
page.content: Every Friday there is a disco at the Stonehill Youth Club.{"Break Dancing" is all the rage now. Dancers spin on their heads, backs or hands all over the floor.{"Body Poppin'"}involves movements of the body e.g. waving the body and locking it into different positions. There are{crews}(groups of dancers) in Birstall called the"Space Cowboys", "Heat Beat Crew" and "Electro Rock Future Shock". It is a very athletic form of solo dancing which mainly involves boys. Dancers wear track suits, trainers, head and wrist bands. The most fashionable make at present is "Nike". The dancing is usually accompanied by loud music from a{Ghettoblaster (large radio). This style of dancing started in the poor black areas of America.
